title: NHPC expects to complete all 4 units of Parbati-II hydro electric project by Dec 2024
description: NHPC, a state-owned company, provided updates on its hydroelectric projects. Firstly, the Parbati-II project in Himachal Pradesh, with a total capacity of 800 MW, is expected to have all four units completed by December 2024. Secondly, the Subansiri Lower project, with a capacity of 2,000 MW, is progressing with three units expected to be finished by March 2025 and the rest by May 2026. Lastly, the Teesta-V power station in Sikkim faced losses initially estimated at Rs 788 crore, but after reassessment, it's now revised to Rs 1,005.10 crore.
